usage: Displays information about the device's battery status, including percentage, health, and temperature.
Retrieves information about the device's cameras, such as resolution and facing direction.
Captures a photo using the device's camera. Usage: termux-camera-photo -c <camera_id> <file_path>
Gets the current content of the device's clipboard.
Sets the content of the device's clipboard. Usage: termux-clipboard-set <text>
Lists all contacts stored on the device.
Displays a dialog box for user input. Usage: termux-dialog -t <title> -i <input_type>
Downloads a file from a URL. Usage: termux-download <url>
Controls media playback on the device. Usage: termux-media-player <play/pause/stop> <file_path>
Creates a notification on the device. Usage: termux-notification -t <title> -c <content>
Displays information from device sensors. Usage: termux-sensor -l to list available sensors.
Displays the content of the SMS inbox.
Sends an SMS message. Usage: termux-sms-send -n <phone_number> '<message>'
Initiates a phone call. Usage: termux-telephony-call <phone_number>
Displays a toast message on the device. Usage: termux-toast <message>
Makes the device vibrate. Usage: termux-vibrate -d <duration_in_ms>
Displays information about the current Wi-Fi connection.
Gets the device's current location. Usage: termux-location -p <provider> -r <request_type>
